page.title: 20Longnor Credits
page.content:
The following pupils of Warslow M ddle School prepared the information on this Domesday Block containing the town of Longnor. Only those marked with an asterix actually live in the area, although the others live close by.
Jane Belfield * Henry Grindon * Rachel Belfield Robert Hall * Clare Cannon Paul Harrison * Justin Carlisle Shelly Port * Gina Carlisle Ann Rowland Carl Critchlow * Alex Walker David Critchlow Deborah Waterhouse * Joanne Critchlow
The staff who helped the pupils were Betty Gouldstone and Brian Taylor.
